body_html: My mistake, by "locally" I meant to say on a single machine (as opposed to a cluster) -- I'm still trying to checkpoint to S3, resulting in the stacktrace/error described above. I'm running my tensorflow code on a p2.xlarge AWS EC2 instance, which AFAIK has 61 GB RAM.

body: My mistake, by "locally" I meant to say on a single machine (as opposed to a cluster) -- I'm still trying to checkpoint to S3, resulting in the stacktrace/error described above. I'm running my tensorflow code on a p2.xlarge AWS EC2 instance, which AFAIK has 61 GB RAM.
